definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: Providence , Rhode Island. do you know it?
sentences.chinese: 普洛威頓斯，羅得島。你知道那裏嗎？

sentences.english: The pair left Cape Cod and headed to Newport, R.
sentences.chinese: 這對夥伴離開科德角後就前往羅得島的紐波特市。

sentences.english: He teaches at Rhode Island College.
sentences.chinese: 他現任教於羅得島州立學院。

sentences.english: I am not sure, where exactly is it?
sentences.chinese: 我不確定，羅得島到底在哪裏？

sentences.english: Rhode Island is the smallest one.
Last month a girl in Lincoln, Rhode Island, sent me a letter.
sentences.chinese: 上個月，一名來自羅得島的小女孩致信於我。
